content: 1 peter the traditional style and light blue color reminds me of the artwork from the tale of peter rabbit www facebook com/happilyevercrochet 2 supplies bernat baby sport - one ball pale blue g/6 4 25mm crochet hook needle for weaving loose ends finished size - 31 x 36 gauge 5 wide and 5 25 tall chain 27 and work in pattern instructions pattern instructions chain 147 1 double_crochet in 4th chain from hook and each chain across - 145 double_crochet 2 chain 3 counts as first double_crochet here and though out double_crochet next double_crochet chain 1 skip next double_crochet repeat across to last double_crochet and top of chain 3 double_crochet next double_crochet and in top of chain from previous row turn 3 chain 3 double_crochet next double_crochet *chain 1 and skip next double_crochet double_crochet 19x* 7 times chain 1 skip next double_crochet double_crochet next stitch and in top of chain 3 of previous row turn www facebook com/happilyevercrochet 3 4&5 repeat row 3 6 chain 3 double_crochet next double_crochet *chain 1 and skip next double_crochet double_crochet 9x chain 2 and skip 1 double_crochet double_crochet 9x* 7 times chain 1 skip next double_crochet double_crochet next stitch and in top of chain 3 of previous row turn 7 chain 3 double_crochet next double_crochet *chain 1 and skip next double_crochet double_crochet 7x chain 2 and skip 2 double_crochet of previous row single_crochet in opening made by chain 2 of previous row chain 2 and skip 2 double_crochet double_crochet 7x* 7 times chain 1 and skip next double_crochet double_crochet next double_crochet and in top of chain 3 of previous row turn 8 chain 3 double_crochet next double_crochet *chain 1 and skip next double_crochet double_crochet 7x double_crochet 2x in chain 2 of previous row chain 1 and skip over single_crochet of previous row double_crochet 2x in chain 2 of previous row double_crochet 7x* 7 times chain 1 and skip next double_crochet double_crochet next double_crochet and in top of chain 3 of previous row turn 9 chain 3 double_crochet next double_crochet *chain 1 and skip next double_crochet double_crochet 9x double_crochet in chain 1 of previous row double_crochet 9x* 7 times chain 1 and skip next double_crochet double_crochet next double_crochet and in top of chain 3 of previous row turn 10&11 repeat row 3 12 repeat row 2 repeat row 3 - 12 eight more times finished blanket is 7 squares in width and 9 row in height 13 chain 3 double_crochet in each double_crochet and chain 1 space of previous row - 145 double_crochet i wanted a more finished edge to my blanket but at this point you could weave in loose ends and be finished this is how my blanket edge looked www facebook com/happilyevercrochet 4 edge 1 at the end of row 13 chain 1 and turn blanket so you can work down the side work 2 slip stitches into the side of each row and tie off once you reach the end of this side 2 attach yarn and work 2 slip
